nodes.excerpt: Salad is the easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC. Our users (or “Chefs”) turn a wealth of idle compute resources into epic loot—including Steam games, digital subscriptions, in-game loot, gift cards, and more.
nodes.title: Salad - The easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC
nodes.author: Salad Technologies

localize.description: 沙拉是最简单、最值得信赖的从PC上获利的方式。我们的用户（或称 "厨师"）将大量的闲置计算资源转化为史诗级的战利品--包括Steam游戏、数字订阅、游戏内战利品、礼品卡等。
localize.tagline: 最简单、最值得信赖的从您的电脑中获利的方法。

localize.description: 沙拉是最簡單、最值得信賴的從PC上獲利的方式。我們的用戶（或稱 "廚師"）將大量的閒置計算資源轉化爲史詩級的戰利品--包括Steam遊戲、數字訂閱、遊戲內戰利品、禮品卡等。
localize.tagline: 最簡單、最值得信賴的從您的電腦中獲利的方法。

nodes.excerpt: Showtime is a social network for crypto art #NFT: - Discover trending art from Zora, Foundation, Superrare, NiftyGateway, Opensea & more - Explore, like, comment & share crypto art - Sign in with wallet or email to curate your profile and show off your art!

nodes.excerpt: Being the first 2-in-1 system for managing dog poop, PooPail makes life easier by scooping waste directly into the pail, then conveniently storing it for up to a week within its compostable and biodegradable bags.

nodes.excerpt: Want to replace annoying SMS 2FA codes? We verify your users by the way they type 4 words. This improves UX significantly and reduces costs by an order of magnitude. Btw: you can get the solution free of charge for a limited time. Check the website for more.
nodes.title: TypingDNA Verify - Replace SMS 2FA codes with better UX: just type 4 words
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 想取代恼人的短信2FA码？我们通过用户输入4个字的方式来验证你的用户。这大大改善了用户体验，并将成本降低了一个数量级。顺便说一下：您可以在有限的时间内免费获得该解决方案。查看网站了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用更好的用户体验取代短信2FA码：只需输入4个字即可。

localize.description: 想取代惱人的短信2FA碼？我們通過用戶輸入4個字的方式來驗證你的用戶。這大大改善了用戶體驗，並將成本降低了一個數量級。順便說一下：您可以在有限的時間內免費獲得該解決方案。查看網站了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用更好的用戶體驗取代短信2FA碼：只需輸入4個字即可。

nodes.excerpt: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.

nodes.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手机应用，它提供了与来自世界各地的其他人的实时跑步课程! 培训师会在我们的实时聊天室里更新你的数据，并与你和你的跑友互动。
localize.tagline: 实时指导的社交跑步应用

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手機應用，它提供了與來自世界各地的其他人的實時跑步課程! 培訓師會在我們的實時聊天室裏更新你的數據，並與你和你的跑友互動。
localize.tagline: 實時指導的社交跑步應用

nodes.excerpt: Live stock prices right in your macOS Dock. Updates every minute. Start with: AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, more coming soon
nodes.title: StockDock - Live stock prices right in your macOS Dock
nodes.author: Andreas Storm

localize.description: 实时股票价格就在你的macOS Dock中。每分钟更新一次。从以下几个方面开始。AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, 更多内容即将推出。
localize.tagline: 实时股票价格就在您的macOS Dock中。

localize.description: 實時股票價格就在你的macOS Dock中。每分鐘更新一次。從以下幾個方面開始。AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, 更多內容即將推出。
localize.tagline: 實時股票價格就在您的macOS Dock中。

nodes.excerpt: https://burnrate.fyi is a SaaS expense estimator designed with ease-of-use in mind. In three easy steps you can choose the products or services you want, configure them, and see your expected burnrate at the end of each month.
nodes.title: burnrate.fyi - Estimate your SaaS expenses in 5 minutes for free
nodes.author: Andrew Hariri

localize.description: https://burnrate.fyi 是一款SaaS费用估算器，设计时考虑到了易用性。在三个简单的步骤中，你可以选择你想要的产品或服务，配置它们，并在每个月末看到你的预期燃烧率。
localize.tagline: 5分钟内免费估算SaaS开支

localize.description: https://burnrate.fyi 是一款SaaS費用估算器，設計時考慮到了易用性。在三個簡單的步驟中，你可以選擇你想要的產品或服務，配置它們，並在每個月末看到你的預期燃燒率。
localize.tagline: 5分鐘內免費估算SaaS開支
